verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> now there was אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> Now there was a man [מִבִּן־ ימין כ] (מִבִּנְיָמִ֗ין <WH1144> Benjamin ק) וּ֠שְׁמוֹ <WH8034> whose name קִ֣ישׁ <WH7027> [was] Kish בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲבִיאֵ֞ל <WH22> of Abiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צְר֧וֹר <WH6872> of Zeror בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בְּכוֹרַ֛ת <WH1064> of Bechorath בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲפִ֖יחַ <WH647> of Aphiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man יְמִינִ֑י <WH3227> right גִּבּ֖וֹר <WH1368> a mighty חָֽיִל׃ <WH2428> of power

וְלוֹ־ הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> had בֵ֜ן <WH1121> And he had a son וּשְׁמ֤וֹ <WH8034> whose name שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> [was] Saul בָּח֣וּר <WH970> a choice young man וָט֔וֹב <WH2896> and a goodly וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> person מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> and [there was] not among the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel ט֣וֹב <WH2896> a goodlier מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> than מִשִּׁכְמ֣וֹ <WH7926> than he from his shoulders וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and upward גָּבֹ֖הַּ <WH1364> [he was] higher מִכָּל־ <WH3605> any הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> than any of the people

וַתֹּאבַ֙דְנָה֙ <WH6> were lost הָאֲתֹנ֔וֹת <WH860> And the asses לְקִ֖ישׁ <WH7027> of Kish אֲבִ֣י <WH1> father שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> Saul's וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said קִ֜ישׁ <WH7027> And Kish אֶל־ <WH413> about שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> to Saul בְּנ֗וֹ <WH1121> his son קַח־ <WH3947> Take נָ֤א <WH4994> now אִתְּךָ֙ <WH854> for אֶת־ <WH853> אַחַ֣ד <WH259> now one מֵֽהַנְּעָרִ֔ים <WH5288> of the servants וְק֣וּם <WH6965> with thee and arise לֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> go בַּקֵּ֖שׁ <WH1245> seek אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲתֹנֹֽת׃ <WH860> the asses

וַיַּעֲבֹ֧ר <WH5674> And he passed through בְּהַר־ <WH2022> mount אֶפְרַ֛יִם <WH669> Ephraim וַיַּעֲבֹ֥ר <WH5674> and passed through בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> the land שָׁלִ֖שָׁה <WH8031> of Shalisha וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not מָצָ֑אוּ <WH4672> but they found וַיַּעַבְר֤וּ <WH5674> [them] not then they passed through בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> the land שַׁעֲלִים֙ <WH8171> of Shalim וָאַ֔יִן <WH369> else וַיַּעֲבֹ֥ר <WH5674> and [there they were] not and he passed through בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> the land יְמִינִ֖י <WH3227> right וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not מָצָֽאוּ׃ <WH4672> but they found

הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> they בָּ֚אוּ <WH935> [And] when they were come בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> to the land צ֔וּף <WH6689> of Zuph וְשָׁא֥וּל <WH7586> Saul אָמַ֛ר <WH559> said לְנַעֲר֥וֹ <WH5288> to his servant אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with לְכָ֣ה <WH1980> Come וְנָשׁ֑וּבָה <WH7725> and let us return פֶּן־ <WH6435> or יֶחְדַּ֥ל <WH2308> leave אָבִ֛י <WH1> lest my father מִן־ <WH4480> about הָאֲתֹנ֖וֹת <WH860> [caring] for the asses וְדָ֥אַג <WH1672> and take thought לָֽנוּ׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said ל֗וֹ הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold נָ֤א <WH4994> now אִישׁ־ <WH376> a man אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God בָּעִ֣יר <WH5892> unto him Behold now [there is] in this city הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise וְהָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man נִכְבָּ֔ד <WH3513> and [he is] an honourable כֹּ֥ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> all that he saith בּ֣וֹא <WH935> cometh יָב֑וֹא <WH935> surely to pass עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now נֵ֣לֲכָה <WH1980> that we should go שָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> there אוּלַי֙ <WH194> perhaps יַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> thither peradventure he can shew לָ֔נוּ אֶת־ <WH853> דַּרְכֵּ֖נוּ <WH1870> us our way אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הָלַ֥כְנוּ <WH1980> have set עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> and

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> Then said שָׁא֜וּל <WH7586> Saul לְנַעֲר֗וֹ <WH5288> to his servant וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold נֵלֵךְ֮ <WH1980> go וּמַה־ <WH4100> what נָּבִ֣יא <WH935> what shall we bring לָאִישׁ֒ <WH376> to the man כִּ֤י <WH3588> for הַלֶּ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> bread אָזַ֣ל <WH235> is spent מִכֵּלֵ֔ינוּ <WH3627> in our vessels וּתְשׁוּרָ֥ה <WH8670> and [there is] not a present אֵין־ <WH369> and there לְהָבִ֖יא <WH935> to bring לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> to the man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God מָ֖ה <WH4100> What אִתָּֽנוּ׃ <WH854> for

וַיֹּ֤סֶף <WH3254> again הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <WH5288> And the servant לַעֲנ֣וֹת <WH6030> answered אֶת־ <WH853> שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> Saul וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> Behold נִמְצָ֣א <WH4672> Behold I have בְיָדִ֔י <WH3027> here at hand רֶ֖בַע <WH7253> the fourth part שֶׁ֣קֶל <WH8255> of a shekel כָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> of silver וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <WH5414> [that] will I give לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> to the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God וְהִגִּ֥יד <WH5046> to tell לָ֖נוּ אֶת־ <WH853> דַּרְכֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH1870> us our way

לְפָנִ֣ים ׀ <WH6440> (Beforetime בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> in Israel כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> used אָמַ֤ר <WH559> thus he spake הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> when a man בְּלֶכְתּוֹ֙ <WH1980> went לִדְר֣וֹשׁ <WH1875> to enquire אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God לְכ֥וּ <WH1980> Come וְנֵלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> go עַד־ <WH5704> against הָרֹאֶ֑ה <WH7203> to the seer כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לַנָּבִיא֙ <WH5030> [called] a Prophet הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> for [he that is] now יִקָּרֵ֥א <WH7121> called לְפָנִ֖ים <WH6440> was beforetime הָרֹאֶֽה׃ <WH7203> to the seer

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁא֧וּל <WH7586> Saul לְנַעֲר֛וֹ <WH5288> to his servant ט֥וֹב <WH2896> Well דְּבָרְךָ֖ <WH1697> Then said לְכָ֣ה ׀ <WH1980> come נֵלֵ֑כָה <WH1980> go וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> went אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> unto the city אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> in it אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> where the man הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> as they עֹלִים֙ <WH5927> [And] as they went up בְּמַעֲלֵ֣ה <WH4608> the hill הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> to the city וְהֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> they מָצְא֣וּ <WH4672> they found נְעָר֔וֹת <WH5291> young maidens יֹצְא֖וֹת <WH3318> going out לִשְׁאֹ֣ב <WH7579> to draw מָ֑יִם <WH4325> water וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> and said לָהֶ֔ן הֲיֵ֥שׁ <WH3426> unto them Is בָּזֶ֖ה <WH2088> to them הָרֹאֶֽה׃ <WH7203> is the seer

וַתַּעֲנֶ֧ינָה <WH6030> And they answered אוֹתָ֛ם <WH853> וַתֹּאמַ֥רְנָה <WH559> them and said יֵּ֖שׁ <WH3426> He is הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> is see לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> behold [he is] before מַהֵ֣ר ׀ <WH4116> you make haste עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now כִּ֤י <WH3588> for הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> to day בָּ֣א <WH935> now for he came לָעִ֔יר <WH5892> to the city כִּ֣י <WH3588> for זֶ֧בַח <WH2077> for [there is] a sacrifice הַיּ֛וֹם <WH3117> to day לָעָ֖ם <WH5971> of the people בַּבָּמָֽה׃ <WH1116> in the high place

כְּבֹאֲכֶ֣ם <WH935> As soon as ye be come הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> into the city כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> ye shall straightway תִּמְצְא֣וּן <WH4672> find אֹת֡וֹ <WH853> בְּטֶרֶם֩ <WH2962> before יַעֲלֶ֨ה <WH5927> him before he go up הַבָּמָ֜תָה <WH1116> to the high place לֶאֱכֹ֗ל <WH398> to eat כִּ֠י <WH3588> because לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not יֹאכַ֤ל <WH398> will not eat הָעָם֙ <WH5971> for the people עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּא֔וֹ <WH935> until he come כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because הוּא֙ <WH1931> he יְבָרֵ֣ךְ <WH1288> because he doth bless הַזֶּ֔בַח <WH2077> the sacrifice אַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> after that כֵ֖ן <WH3651> after that יֹאכְל֣וּ <WH398> they eat הַקְּרֻאִ֑ים <WH7121> that be bidden וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> Now עֲל֔וּ <WH5927> Now therefore get you up כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because אֹת֥וֹ <WH853> כְהַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> for about this time תִּמְצְא֥וּן <WH4672> ye shall find אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וַֽיַּעֲל֖וּ <WH5927> And they went up הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> the city הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> as they בָּאִים֙ <WH935> [and] when they were come בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> into הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> into the city וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> behold Samuel יֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> came out לִקְרָאתָ֔ם <WH7122> toward לַעֲל֖וֹת <WH5927> them for to go up הַבָּמָֽה׃ <WH1116> to the high place ס

וַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Now the LORD גָּלָ֖ה <WH1540> had told אֶת־ <WH853> אֹ֣זֶן <WH241> in his ear שְׁמוּאֵ֑ל <WH8050> Samuel י֣וֹם <WH3117> day אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> a לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before בֽוֹא־ <WH935> came שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> Saul לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כָּעֵ֣ת ׀ <WH6256> about this time מָחָ֡ר <WH4279> To morrow אֶשְׁלַח֩ <WH7971> I will send אֵלֶ֨יךָ <WH413> about אִ֜ישׁ <WH376> thee a man מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land בִּנְיָמִ֗ן <WH1144> of Benjamin וּמְשַׁחְתּ֤וֹ <WH4886> and thou shalt anoint לְנָגִיד֙ <WH5057> him [to be] captain עַל־ <WH5921> over עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> over my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel וְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <WH3467> that he may save אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> my people מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> out of the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> of the Philistines כִּ֤י <WH3588> because רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7200> for I have looked אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> upon my people כִּ֛י <WH3588> because בָּ֥אָה <WH935> is come צַעֲקָת֖וֹ <WH6818> because their cry אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> when

וּשְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> And when Samuel רָאָ֣ה <WH7200> saw אֶת־ <WH853> שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> Saul וַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD עָנָ֔הוּ <WH6030> said הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> unto him Behold the man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> of whom אָמַ֣רְתִּי <WH559> whom I spake אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> to you זֶ֖ה <WH2088> This יַעְצֹ֥ר <WH6113> to thee of this same shall reign בְּעַמִּֽי׃ <WH5971> over my people

וַיִּגַּ֥שׁ <WH5066> drew near שָׁא֛וּל <WH7586> Then Saul אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> to Samuel בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in הַשָּׁ֑עַר <WH8179> the gate וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said הַגִּֽידָה־ <WH5046> Tell נָּ֣א <WH4994> Please לִ֔י אֵי־ <WH335> me I pray thee where זֶ֖ה <WH2088> he בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house הָרֹאֶֽה׃ <WH7203> the seer's

וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> answered שְׁמוּאֵ֜ל <WH8050> And Samuel אֶת־ <WH853> שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> Saul וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I הָרֹאֶ֔ה <WH7203> am the seer עֲלֵ֤ה <WH5927> go up לְפָנַי֙ <WH6440> before הַבָּמָ֔ה <WH1116> me unto the high place וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֥ם <WH398> for ye shall eat עִמִּ֖י <WH5973> with הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> with me to day וְשִׁלַּחְתִּ֣יךָ <WH7971> I will let thee go בַבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> and to morrow וְכֹ֛ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> is on בִּֽלְבָבְךָ֖ <WH3824> thee all that [is] in thine heart אַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> and will tell לָֽךְ׃

וְלָאֲתֹנ֞וֹת <WH860> And as for thine asses הָאֹבְד֣וֹת <WH6> that were lost לְךָ֗ הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> days שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> three הַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> ago אַל־ <WH408> not תָּ֧שֶׂם <WH7760> set אֶֽת־ <WH853> לִבְּךָ֛ <WH3820> not thy mind לָהֶ֖ם כִּ֣י <WH3588> for נִמְצָ֑אוּ <WH4672> on them for they are found וּלְמִי֙ <WH4310> whom כָּל־ <WH3605> is all חֶמְדַּ֣ת <WH2532> And on whom [is] all the desire יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> not לְךָ֔ וּלְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> is all בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> court אָבִֽיךָ׃ <WH1> your father's ס

וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> answered שָׁא֜וּל <WH7586> And Saul וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said הֲל֨וֹא <WH3808> not בֶן־ יְמִינִ֤י <WH1145> [Am] not I a Benjamite אָ֙נֹכִי֙ <WH595> I מִקַּטַנֵּי֙ <WH6996> of the smallest שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וּמִשְׁפַּחְתִּי֙ <WH4940> of all the families הַצְּעִרָ֔ה <WH6810> the least מִכָּֽל־ <WH3605> of all מִשְׁפְּח֖וֹת <WH4940> the families שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> of the tribe בִנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> Benjamin וְלָ֙מָּה֙ <WH4100> how long דִּבַּ֣רְתָּ <WH1696> speak אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about כַּדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> thou so הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this ס

וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> took שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> And Samuel אֶת־ <WH853> שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> Saul וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> נַעֲר֔וֹ <WH5288> and his servant וַיְבִיאֵ֖ם <WH935> and brought לִשְׁכָּ֑תָה <WH3957> them into the parlour וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> and made them sit לָהֶ֤ם מָקוֹם֙ <WH4725> place בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> in the chiefest הַקְּרוּאִ֔ים <WH7121> among them that were bidden וְהֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> who כִּשְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> which [were] about thirty אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> persons
